title.en: Music to Delight the Victorious Ones and Their Heirs

text.en: Namo guru!
text.en-trans: namo guru

text.en: I pray that the vajra gurus, hosts of vidyādharas,
text.en-trans: dorjé lama rigdzin tsok nam dang

text.en: Yidams who support accomplishment, ḍākinīs and dharmapālas
text.en-trans: yidam drub tek daki chökyong tsok

text.en: All bear witness to the pure fulfilment
text.en-trans: dak gi jitar mönpa di zhindu

text.en: Of these, my prayers of aspiration, just as I wish.
text.en-trans: namdak drubpé pangpo dzé du sol

text.en: This life is as impermanent as a dewdrop on a blade of grass;
text.en-trans: tsé di mi tak tsa tsé zilpa dra

text.en: There’s even a chance that I might die tonight or tomorrow.
text.en-trans: donub sang yang namchi chamé pé

text.en: Inspire me, therefore, to end my craving for all the riches of this world
text.en-trans: sipé püntsok kün la zhenlok té

text.en: And develop, from deep within, a determination to be free.
text.en-trans: ngejung tingné kyewar jingyi lob

text.en: As it is the foundation for the path to liberation,
text.en-trans: tarpé lam gyi zhima tsultrim kyi

text.en: Inspire me to cleanse the basis of ethical discipline,
text.en-trans: sa zhi tsangma jidor lek jé né

text.en: And never to let it be corrupted in any way
text.en-trans: tungwa dé nga tra rak dang chepé

text.en: By the five types of downfall,1however slight.
text.en-trans: namyang göpa mepar jingyi lob

text.en: Bless me, that the jewel of altruistic bodhicitta
text.en-trans: zhenpen changchub sem kyi norbu la

text.en: May remain unsullied by base thoughts of self-interest,
text.en-trans: rangdön yi jé tokpa ngenpa yi

text.en: And emptiness of which compassion is the very core
text.en-trans: ma lé tongnyi nyingjé nyingpochen

text.en: May swiftly take hold within my stream of being.
text.en-trans: nyurdu gyü la kyewar jingyi lob

text.en: May my mindstream be ripened by pure empowerment
text.en-trans: tsennyi tsangwé dorjé lobpön lé

text.en: Received from a fully qualified vajra master,
text.en-trans: namdak wang gi dak gyü min jé né

text.en: And, by genuinely maintaining the solemn samaya pledges,
text.en-trans: damtsik nyenpo tsulzhin sungwa yi

text.en: May I unerringly adopt the supreme path of Vajrayāna.
text.en-trans: dorjé lam chok normé nyé gyur chik

text.en: Through generation and perfection, may I control my clinging to perception as ordinary,
text.en-trans: kyé dang dzokpé tamal nang zhen dom

text.en: And, bringing the entire web of aggregates, elements, channels, energies and essences
text.en-trans: pung kham tsa lung tiklé drawa kün

text.en: To maturity within utterly pure and immaculate luminosity,
text.en-trans: shintu namdak duldral ösal du

text.en: May I perfect the great bliss that is immutable.
text.en-trans: min né gyurmé dechen tar sön shok

text.en: Through the swift approach, the profound stage of guru practice,
text.en-trans: nyelam zabmö lamé rimpa yi

text.en: May I blessed with insight into the genuine nature of mind,
text.en-trans: nyukmé sem la jingyi lob pa dang

text.en: And realize, just as it is, without any error,
text.en-trans: khakhyab dorjé yeshe kha chenpo

text.en: The vast wisdom sky of all-pervasive vajra wisdom.
text.en-trans: manor jizhin ngönsum tokpar shok

text.en: Throughout all my lives to come, may I gain certainty
text.en-trans: kyewa küntu lama dorjé chang

text.en: That the guru is Vajradhara, great face and embodiment of the Three Roots,
text.en-trans: tsa sum dü zhal chenpor ngeshé nyé

text.en: May uncontrived devotion arise from deep within,
text.en-trans: chömin mögü nang né kyewa dang

text.en: And may I attain the original buddhahood that is its own effect.
text.en-trans: rang dré dangpö sangye tobpar shok

text.en: For as long as conditioned existence continues to endure,
text.en-trans: sipa jisi né kyi bar dak tu

text.en: By adopting the excellent form of a bodhisattva,
text.en-trans: changchub sempé lü zang la ten né

text.en: May I perfect the aspirations of the heroic Mañjuśrī
text.en-trans: tayé drowé dön nam drubpa la

text.en: To accomplish the welfare of beings in their infinity.2
text.en-trans: jampal pawö mönlam dzokpar shok

text.en: During this final era of five hundred years in particular,
text.en-trans: khyepar ngabgyé tamar ten dro la

text.en: When human and non-human forces harm the teachings and beings,
text.en-trans: tsewé jungpo mi dang mi min nam

text.en: May I have the strength of compassion’s intense wrath
text.en-trans: nyingjé drakpor tröpé tobshuk kyi

text.en: And smash the legions of Māra to smithereens.
text.en-trans: dü kyi dé tsok chemar tak jé shok

text.en: With the great fire of scripture and reasoning,
text.en-trans: gangzhik tachö ngenpé tsa bur nam

text.en: May I be able to set alight in a single instant
text.en-trans: nam mang lung dang rigpé zhuk chen gyi

text.en: The straw and chaff of erroneous views and conduct,
text.en-trans: kechik tsam la sek né yangdak gi

text.en: And illuminate the unmistaken view, meditation and action.
text.en-trans: ta gom chöpa trulmé sal nü shok

text.en: May I adopt the lifestyle of the great Jowo and his heirs,3
text.en-trans: ngön jön jowo yabsé namtar dang

text.en: Become proficient in all the enlightened deeds
text.en-trans: chakdzok drubpé lobpön ché nam kyi

text.en: Of the accomplished masters of Mahāmudrā and Dzogchen
text.en-trans: dzepa jinyé kün la wangjor té

text.en: And be of service to the teachings of the Victorious Ones!
text.en-trans: gyalwé ten la jawa jepar shok

text.en: In short, may I thoroughly and perfectly accomplish
text.en-trans: dorna changchub chöpé mönlam nam

text.en: All the aspirations of bodhisattva conduct without exception,
text.en-trans: malü dak gi gyü la yongsu dzok

text.en: And, in time, when saṃsāra is eventually emptied,
text.en-trans: namzhik khorwa tongpar gyurpé tsé

text.en: Merge into the dharmakāya expanse of Samantabhadra.
text.en-trans: kunzang chökü long du tim gyur chik
